Class PlayerActionMessage

java.lang.Object

public class PlayerActionMessage extends NetworkMessage
Class PlayerActionMessage represent the PlayerAction message

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerActionMessage

      public PlayerActionMessage(@NotNull @NotNull String nickname, @NotNull @NotNull PlayerActionMessage.ActionType playerActionType, int assistantIndex, Student movedStudent, boolean movesToIsland, int destinationIslandIndex, int chosenMNBaseSteps, int chosenCloudTileIndex, int chosenCharacterIndex, CharacterCardNetworkParamSet characterCardParameters)
      Constructs a Player Action message with the raw data
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the Player that performed the action
      playerActionType - The action type
      assistantIndex - The chosen assistant card index
      movedStudent - The chosen Student to move
      movesToIsland - Whether the student moves to an Island or to the Dining Room
      destinationIslandIndex - The destination island index
      chosenMNBaseSteps - The number of steps Mother Nature must move by
      chosenCloudTileIndex - The chosen cloud tile index
      chosenCharacterIndex - The chosen character card index
      characterCardParameters - The chosen character card parameters

      MessageDecodeException - If the decode fails
